entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
